mapper.select: SELECT r.RID, r.roomId, r.MID ,m.MNAME,r.RCHECK, to_char(r.rDate,'yy-mm-dd') as RDATE, to_char(r.rDate,'hh24:mm') as RTIME, r.RIMG FROM reservation r , MEMBER m where r.MID = m.MID
SELECT r.RID, r.roomId, r.MID ,m.MNAME,r.RCHECK, to_char(r.rDate,'yy-mm-dd') as RDATE, to_char(r.rDate,'hh24:mm') as RTIME, r.RIMG FROM reservation r , MEMBER m where r.MID = m.MID
mapper.update: update reservation set ROOMID = #{roomID}, RCHECK = 1 where RID =#{rid} and MID =#{mid}
mapper.select: select m.mid, m.mname, m.mbti, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, m.MBIRTH)/12) AS AGE , r.rid, r.rimg from Member m, Reservation r where r.RID =#{rid} and m.MID =#{mid}
